fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose Vanilla, Chocolate, or Strawberry ice cream. If Vanilla, any investigative roles targeting you will taste the ice cream, and instead target someone who visited you at random, ignoring any effect which would change the result. They will be notified of their new target. If Chocolate, any killing roles targeting you will taste the ice cream, and gain a level of attack power on their next attack, If Strawberry, any protective roles will taste the ice cream, and prevent you from taking hellbent damage tonight and the next, and, if it involves setting or increasing defense, will increase the defense of the next person targeted by that ability by one level

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have every version of ice cream tasted by someone (can win while dead)
